title: Where has my LP gone??
body:
I recently won my promos to get into silver 1.  First game in the league I won, and it gave me +22 LP.  However, it said the resulting LP was only 19??  I looked up ways LP could be lost and found that queue dodging loses 3, but that didn't make sense because I'd never dodged a queue this season, although someone on my team had before I started that game.  Without thinking too much of it, I played another game and lost -17, bringing me down to 2.  My next game, someone queue dodged again, then I won +21, but resulted in 21 LP...

Do I personally lose 3 LP when someone else on my team queue dodges?  If not, where the heck is all my LP going??

replies.body:
You do not start at 0 LP after the promo game, you probably had 2 LP over the 100 needed to qualify for the series.

..I misread that completely.

Really good question 0-o
